parameters: Adventurer Rex: Alright, it looks like everyone has boarded.

Thief Nora: Wow, this is amazing! It's my first time riding
on a carriage!

Mage Relm: It seems like there's nothing for me to learn
from talking to all of you.

Rex: Ahaha, it seems like I stepped on a stone. Are you
okay?
Mage Relm: I can't even read my book peacefully...
Mage Relm: Come on, hurry up!
Mage Relm: I am the client, so please treat me properly.

Clea: Well then, let me explain the rules of Shiritori. It's
a game where you have to say a word that starts with the
last letter of the previous word--

Mage Relm: I know that! Honestly, barbarians like you are
such a nuisance.

Mage Relm: This continues until the arrival... sigh, why is
a genius like me stuck in a situation like this?
Mage Relm: They still haven't arrived!?

Adventurer Rex: We've already entered the Oros region, so it
won't be much longer.
Mage Relm: You said the same thing earlier... Honestly.
Mage Relm: By the way, I've been wondering about something.

Mage Relm: That ornament on your head... It's quite
intricate, resembling real ears... It's almost like a
Paraxeno beastman.

Mage Relm: Yes, it's about the continent where the beastmen
live. It's an unexplored continent that is also a research
subject at the Magic Academy.
Thief Nora: Oh, so my hometown is called that!
Mage Relm: Huh... Are those real ears?
Thief Nora: Ah, yes. That's right.

Mage Relm: Please let me confirm it! If they're real, then
I'm immediately a senior mage at the academy!
Thief Nora: Hey, no, please stop!!

Mage Relm: Um, I apologize for my rudeness earlier. Could
you please teach me some words in Paraxeno?

Mage Relm: There might be hints of lost magic within the
words!

Thief Nora: Well, you see, I can't seem to remember it well,
so it's really strange, but the words just won't come out
smoothly.

Thief Nora: It feels like as soon as I learned the words of
the Empire, they slipped out of my head.

Mage Relm: Sigh... I understand... If there's any way... a
magic of memory... no, no...

Mage Relm: Talking in your sleep... Can you really sleep in
a place like this?
Thief Nora: Hehehe, what a strange sleep talk...!
Mage Relm: Is it really that strange--

Mage Relm: W-What was that word just now!? Please, just one
more time, one more time, please!
Thief Nora: Huh, what is it?

Mage Relm: Words are coming out unconsciously...? Hey, Clea-
san, say something interesting!
Thief Nora: Oh, it's pitiful if you wake her up.
Mage Relm: Ugh... why, why doesn't anything go well!!
Adventurer Rex: Ahaha, what a lively journey.
